original_title: No-faith motion on Keheliya handed over to Speaker
original_body_lines: The Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) sponsored a no-confidence motion on Minister of Health Keheliya Rambukwella was handed over to Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardene today.
SJB MPs Kavinda Jayawardene and Ranjith Madduma Bandara handed over the motion to the Speaker this afternoon.
“Around 50 MPs have signed the motion,” Dr. Jayawardene told the Daily Mirror.
The motion says Mr. Rambukwella is responsible for the crisis in hospitals and the procurement of substandard medicines as the subject minister.
The No Confidence motion will have to be given priority as per Standing Orders in Parliament. Therefore it has to be included in the order book after it is accepted by the Speaker.
Meanwhile, Minister Rambukwella told the House that he is even ready for a three-day debate on the motion.
“I  have much to reveal during the debate,” he said. (Yohan Perera and Ajith Siriwardana)
